body: I hope that this will not be an issue as we move past the Go 1.5 release.  Since SWIG now depends only on documented interfaces, it should no longer be necessary to update SWIG for each new Go release, and after everybody is using Go 1.5 and SWIG 3.0.6 there should no longer be a concern about having a mismatch between SWIG and Go.  I hope.
